net.sf.openrds
Class NodeEventAdaptor

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
INodeEventListener
public class NodeEventAdaptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements INodeEventListener

Empty implementation of INodeEventListener, to avoid having to declare every listener's method.

Author:
Rodrigo

                                     java.lang.Object result)
Description copied from interface: INodeEventListener
Called when a node finishs processing a requisition with success.
IMPORTANT: On IMainNode this works only when calling IMainNode.processRequisition() and not when calling IMainNode.processAsyncRequisition()
